SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.authentication

Klasse LoginController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.authentication.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for handling the login functionality in the application. Provides methods for user authentication and navigation between login and registration views. Handles loading the user's cinematics data upon successful login and navigating to the dashboard view.

This class interacts with the AuthenticationController, CinematicRepository, and several services such as DialogService, LogService, SessionManagerService, and ViewLoaderService.

Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut

  • Konstruktordetails

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()
      Constructs a LoginController and initializes required dependencies for authentication, cinematic data access, view loading, and dialog handling.

  • Methodendetails

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin()
      Handles the login action. Authenticates the user and loads the dashboard view with the user's cinematics if the login is successful. Displays an error dialog otherwise.

    • switchToRegister

      private void switchToRegister()
      Navigates the user to the registration view. Displays an error dialog if navigation fails.

    • prepareDashboardView

      private void prepareDashboardView(List<Cinematic> cinematics)
      Prepares and navigates the user to the dashboard view with the provided cinematics. Displays an error dialog if navigation fails.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - A list of Cinematic objects associated with the logged-in user.
